name: som-se
tagline: Application of Self-Organizing Maps for Search Engine
body:
### Welcome to Application of Self-Organizing Maps for Search Engine
# Installation Instructions
[Java Runtime Environment](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre7-downloads-1880261.html) (6 or greater) is required to run SOMToolbox, so make sure that you have it installed on your system.
## Install SOMToolbox
You may follow installation instructions at the official [The Java SOMToolbox](http://www.ifs.tuwien.ac.at/dm/somtoolbox/) webpage. Or download the latest release from [here (.tar.gz)](http://www.ifs.tuwien.ac.at/dm/download/somtoolbox_0.7.5-3.svn4280.tar.gz) or [here (.zip)] (http://www.ifs.tuwien.ac.at/dm/download/somtoolbox_0.7.5-3.svn4280.zip). To do so from terminal run:
```
$ mkdir somtoolbox
$ cd somtoolbox
$ wget http://www.ifs.tuwien.ac.at/dm/download/somtoolbox_0.7.5-3.svn4280.tar.gz
$ tar -xzf somtoolbox_0.7.5-3.svn4280.tar.gz
```
## Install coreutils (Mac OS X)
On **Mac OS X** you need to install gnu [coreutils](http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/).
One of the way to do it is using [homebrew](http://brew.sh). 
If you do not have it installed run the following command from the terminal (**âŒ˜ + t**) 
```
$ ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/go/install)"
```
To install coreutils invoke
```
$ brew install coreutils
```
Your also need to change readlink command in somtoolbox.sh file to greadlink. You can do it with sed, running the following command in somtoolbox directory
```
$ sed -i .bak "s/readlink/greadlink/" somtoolbox.sh
```
## Get tutorial data files
You may follow the links at the top of the page to clone the current repository.
Or (assuming you are still in **sometoolox** directory) run:
```
$ git clone https://github.com/mail-go-russir-2014/som-se.git data
```
# Running Experiments
## For Unix-like system users:
```
$ ./somtoolbox.sh SOMViewer -c ./data/class.nodr.soft.TT.cls -m ./data/class.nodr.soft.TT.map -t ./data/class.nodr.soft.TT.tv -u ./data/class.nodr.soft.TT.unit -v ./data/class.nodr.soft.TT.viz.vec -w ./data/class.nodr.soft.TT.wgt
```
## For Windows users:
```
$ somtoolbox.bat SOMViewer -c .\data\class.nodr.soft.TT.cls -m .\data\class.nodr.soft.TT.map -t .\data\class.nodr.soft.TT.tv -u .\data\class.nodr.soft.TT.unit -v .\data\class.nodr.soft.TT.viz.vec -w .\data\class.nodr.soft.TT.wgt
```
### Menu Screenshot
![Screenshot](http://mail-go-russir-2014.github.io/som-se/images/MenuScreenshot.png)
### Types of Visualizations to try:
1. Hit Histogram
2. U-Matrix
3. Smoothed Data Histogram
4. Cluster Feature Impact
